subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Toronto Maple Leafs fired General Manager Dave Nonis, who had three years left on his contract, as well as their interim coach, Peter Horachek, and his entire staff on Sunday.
snippet: The Toronto Maple Leafs fired General Manager Dave Nonis, who had three years left on his contract, as well as their interim coach, Peter Horachek, and his entire staff on Sunday.
